thread.title: Susan Weitzel

author: Susan Weitzel
title: Susan Weitzel
text: Whole Latte Love was great to work with, easy to order online, machine arrived quickly and with no issues at all. I had an opportunity to be kind of panicky with the sales/service people, because I had ordered a different machine than I meant to. But they were darling and helpful, and it turned out that the machine that was almost to my house was the perfect choice. They were absolutely ready to deal with me changing my order, no problem at all. Also, I love the machine. It is the non-plumbable Expobar Brewtus IV.
